name: Biking Tour in Mai Chau Valley, Cuc phuong National Park
description: Discovering Vietnam from a unique perspective. An active holiday where you get to know the country intimately as you join the locals on the country’s most popular mode of transport, the bicycle. Stop for the perfect photo as you cycle down backstreet lanes. Bai Dinh Pagoda of Ninh Binh province which has not only the tallest and heaviest bronze statue of Buddha but also many other records.Covering an area of around 700 hectares, will be one of the biggest pagodas in all of Southeast Asia when finished. The work of Bai Dinh Pagoda was kicked off in 2004 and will be completed in 2015
